p: The plants belonging to the genus Withania of Solanaceae family are generally acclaimed as medicinally essential due to the high therapeutic and nutraceutical potential. One of the plants of the genus, W. somnifera ( Figure 1) , possessed a plethora of medicinal uses and pharmacological applications. W. somnifera (Syn: ashwagandha, suranjan, winter cherry, Indian ginseng) is a xerophytic plant that nurtures abundantly in Africa, the Mediterranean, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, and India ( 5- 9).
